attributes.action: Let people who have had past injuries in the military
attributes.additional_details: I believe the government should do this as we are already very low on military recruitment, especially army recruitment. I also believe this is important as we are on red alert for a war and still escalating
attributes.background: Let people in the the military with past injuries, if they don’t require medical care or attention anymore and are deemed medically fit

rejection.details:
People are already allowed in the military with past injuries, if they don’t require medical care or attention anymore and are deemed medically fit.

If you would like changes to this, you could start a petition about that.
